snippet: An explosion tore through a meeting of Ahrar al-Sham on Tuesday, killing a dozen of its leaders and striking a blow against the forces seeking to topple President Bashar al-Assad.

byline.contributor: Mohammed Ghannam and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: An explosion tore through a meeting of Ahrar al-Sham on Tuesday, killing a dozen of its leaders and striking a blow against the forces seeking to topple President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.main: Blast Decimates Leadership of Syrian Rebel Group
headline.print_headline: Blast Decimates Leadership of Syrian Rebel Group
